property.value: When played as a maneuver, you may discard up to 5 cards, this card is -2F for each card discarded. As a reversal, reverse any non-Superstar-specific non-maneuver card. When successfully played, draw 1 card.

property.value: When your first card played on your turn is an Action: Movie card, it cannot be reversed. You may pack both Cheater and Fan Favorite cards, and you may pack The Rock cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any card and put up to 3 cards removed from the game on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your Fortitude is 10 or more and you reversed a card to end your opponent's turn, you may put this card into your Ring from your hand. property.value: When packing this card, you may also pack other Enforcer cards (except Shane O' Mac... or Stephanie?), they have no brands. When you reveal the Mankind/Cactus Jack, or... Dude Love? Enforcer card, reveal 1 additional Enforcer card. Whenever you choose an Enforcer, you may choose 1 additional Enforcer from the Mankind/Cactus Jack, or... Dude Love? Card. Your Starting Hand Size cannot be greater than 8.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, where # is equal to the number of ECW cards in your Ring. You may reveal 1 Enforcer card and you may choose a new Enforcer. When this card is in your Ring area, before your Draw Segment, you may shuffle it into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text

If he does not, before each of your Draw Segments, he overturns 1 card. Your Zero Tolerance: Kiss My Magnificent A%$ cards cannot be reversed by Elbow to the Face.

property.name: Card Text

When this card is in your Ring, ignore the µCan only be played' text on your Debilitating Injury: Concussion card, and it cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text

property.value: You may put a maneuver of D:4 or less from your hand into your Ring. When this card is in your Ring, you may remove cards of D:3 or less with your Ability, and your action cards are Permanent. When this card is in your Ringside, you may discard 3 cards and then put it in your hand.
